story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Monitoring & Logging (ML) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Operations
**Purpose:** Monitor AI systems for security events

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic AI interaction logging and monitoring capability.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Basic interaction logging enabled
  - User/session identifier (hashed for privacy)
  - Input received (or secure reference)
  - Output generated (or secure reference)
  - Timestamp and context

- [ ] Log storage secured
  - Access-controlled storage
  - Minimum 30-day retention
  - Tamper protection enabled
  - Encryption at rest

- [ ] Anomaly awareness established
  - Baseline usage patterns documented
  - Unusual request patterns identified
  - Error rate baselines set
  - Suspicious patterns defined

- [ ] Basic alerting configured
  - Error rate monitoring
  - Availability monitoring
  - Security event detection
  - Manual review capability

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Logging verified in all environments
- [ ] Alerts tested and working
- [ ] Team can investigate incidents

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- All risks (monitoring enables detection)
- ASI02: Tool Misuse & Exploitation
- ASI03: Identity & Privilege Abuse
- ASI07: Insecure Inter-Agent Communication
- ASI10: Rogue Agents
- LLM02: Sensitive Information Disclosure

## Resources

- [ML Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/ML-Software-OnePager.md)
- [Incident Response Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/incident-response-checklist.md)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-practice ML` for monitoring guidance.

subtasks.description: Enable logging of all AI system interactions with appropriate privacy controls.
